mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_clue ( CLUE_ID, USER_CONTENT_ID, CLUE_TIME, CLUE_APP_ID, CLUE_OPENID, CLUE_CONTENT_TITLE, CLUE_TYPE, CLUE_POSITION, CLUE_POSITION_NAME ) VALUES ( #{clueId}, #{userContentId}, #{clueTime}, #{clueAppId}, #{clueOpenId}, #{clueContentTitle}, #{clueType}, #{cluePosition}, #{cluePositionName} )
